mapper.insert: insert into `tb_goods` (gname, goprice, grprice, gstore, gpicture, goodstype_id, iputtime) values (#{gname}, #{goprice}, #{grprice}, #{gstore}, #{gpicture}, #{goodstypeId.id}, #{iputTime})
mapper.update: update `tb_goods` set gname = #{gname}, goprice = #{goprice}, grprice = #{grprice}, gstore = #{gstore}, gpicture = #{gpicture}, goodstype_id = #{goodstypeId.id} , iputtime = #{iputTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT g.id, g.gname, g.goprice, g.grprice, g.gstore, g.gpicture, gt.id AS goodstype_id, g.iputtime, gt.typename FROM tb_goods g JOIN tb_goodstype gt ON g.goodstype_id = gt.id WHEN g.id=#{id}
